name: Crippling Crossbow
description: The ever-weeping woodgrain of this crossbow coats every bolt in a potent but short-lived narcotic sap.

abilities.name: Hobble
abilities.description: Hits an enemy for some damage, then slows them and reduces the effectiveness of health restoration on the target for some time. The slow gradually decays over the duration.
notes: The following values decrease per server tick, over 120 instances: 2.67% movement speed per tick
Reapplying the debuff refreshes the duration and resets the slow value
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the health restore reduction is increased by 30% (to 52%)

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
